path.style: pointer-events: none; stroke-width: 1; fill: rgb(99, 110, 250); fill-opacity: 1; stroke: rgb(255, 255, 255); stroke-opacity: 1; opacity: 0.7;

text.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 12px; fill: rgb(255, 255, 255); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
